column2: "Oh, hello, comrade. There have been a lot more ARKS coming to Naberius lately."
"Before we had that incident with the Darkers, it was rare to run into anyone here."
"But the fact that there are a lot of ARKS here means that it's very dangerous. Really, not needing anyone here would be best."
"We'd be out of a job if that happened, but peace would be better."
"Hm? There was someone saying the same thing as me?"
